title: Women Locked Up: Inside the Dóchas
overview: Women Locked Up: Inside the Dóchas Centre, which provides unprecedented access and insights into life behind bars in Ireland's largest women's prison. Filmed over the course of seven months, with support from Coimisiún na Meán's Sound and Vision funding scheme, this three-part docuseries tells the human story on both sides of the prison door, from staff and prisoners.
